page.title: 14PARTRIDGE GREEN LAW & ORDER
page.content: POLICE CONSTABLE POWELL lives in the POLICE HOUSE in the village and keeps the peace.He is popular and enjoys being part of the community.He is occasionally called out to bad crimes but on the whole it is a peaceful area.There are one or two young people of between 14 and 17 years of age who get frustrated with little to do in the village and who look for trouble but really there is little CRIME.There are about 2 MOTOR ACCIDENTS a week to which P.C.POWELL is called.It is too large an area for a BICYCLE PATROL so a police van equipped to set up road blocks and mark off roads is used.Partridge Green is a WAR DUTY STATION with a NUCLEAR ALARM SYSTEM connected to the fire station.
